long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Your X (Twitter) Bookmarks with Ease

Never lose your favorite tweets again! Bookmark Save is the ultimate free tool for X (Twitter) users who want to preserve and organize their bookmarked content.

Key Features:

- One-click export of all your X bookmarks
- Multiple export formats: TXT, CSV, PDF, and Markdown
- Smart categorization to help you sort your bookmarks
- Thread detection for seamless reading
- Secure Google Sign-In integration
- Export history tracking

Whether you're a casual user or a power researcher, Bookmark Save helps you keep your valuable X content accessible and organized. Don't let your carefully curated bookmarks disappear!

Download Bookmark Save now and take control of your X experience!

Notice:
Currently this extension is completely FREE. This may be subject to change as more features get added.
